Function.Function_Signature: get_pixel(port: int, x: int, y: int) -> tuple[int, int]
Function.Function_Description: Retrieve a specific pixel represented as a tuple containing the color and intensity

Function_Arguments.Argument_Description: A port from the port submodule in the hub module

Function_Snippet.Python_Code:
from hub import port
import color_matrix

# Print the color and intensity of the 0,0 pixel on the Color Matrix connected to port A 
print(color_matrix.get_pixel(port.A, 0, 0))
